item.title: Your Devlogs
item.description: The point of keeping a running diary-journal-devlog is to have a single point where you can see your evolution over this course. It’s a place to tie your readings to the discussions to the hands-on nuts-and-bolts of doing informatics work. It’s a place to leave notes to ‘future you’ so that when you walk away from the machine, you can pick up where you were again. It’s also a place for you to see what your peers are up to, their successes, and their roadblocks.
